effect.ruby_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. User is forced to attack with this move for 2–3 turns,selected at random. After the last hit, the user becomes confused. safeguard does not protect against the confusion from this move.
effect.emerald: Inflicts regular damage. User is forced to attack with this move for 2–3 turns,selected at random. After the last hit, the user becomes confused. safeguard does not protect against the confusion from this move.
effect.firered_leafgreen: Inflicts regular damage. User is forced to attack with this move for 2–3 turns,selected at random. After the last hit, the user becomes confused. safeguard does not protect against the confusion from this move.
effect.colosseum: Inflicts regular damage. User is forced to attack with this move for 2–3 turns,selected at random. After the last hit, the user becomes confused. safeguard does not protect against the confusion from this move.
effect.xd: Inflicts regular damage. User is forced to attack with this move for 2–3 turns,selected at random. After the last hit, the user becomes confused. safeguard does not protect against the confusion from this move.

short_effect.ruby_sapphire: Hits every turn for 2-3 turns, then confuses the user.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A rampage of 2 to 3 turns that confuses the user.
flavor_text.emerald: A rampage of 2 to 3 turns that confuses the user.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The user thrashes about for two to three turns, then becomes confused.
